<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Bonding Agent Mid Shift- West Houston]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
A Better Bail Bond is the premiere bail bond company in Houston, Texas.  Our 30 years of experience qualifies us as experts in the bail bond industry, nationwide.  Though we may seem like a small company with multiple offices, we are actually a large family living & working in different offices; but connected by our desire to provide an excellent service for those in need of our help.  
  

  
Job Duties:
  

  

  
+ Bonding agent is required to exhibit clerical skills by preparing various types of bail bonds
  

  
+ Light filing required
  

  
+  Must use sales techniques and offer customer service to potential customers in a manner that leads to finalized sale
  

  
+ Should type a minimum 25-30 wpm
  

  
+ There is a required monthly sales quota
  

  

  
Minimum Qualifications:
  

  

  
+ Must be at least  18 years old
  

  
+ Must have a high school diploma or equivalent
  

  
+ Be authorized to work in the United States
  

  

  
Address:  4240 Hwy 6 N.  Houston, TX 77084 (HARRIS COUNTY, TEXAS)
  

  
Shift: 10am-7pm Tues-Sat (OFF SUN & MON)
  

  
Starting Pay: $13-$15 per hour (plus commission)
  

  
(1 WEEK PAID TRAINING)

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Debt Collector]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
A Better Bail Bond is the premiere company in Houston, Texas.  Our 39 plus years of experience qualifies us as experts in the bailbond industry, nationwide.  Though we may seem like a small company with multiple offices, we are actually a large family living & working in different offices; but connected by our desire to provide an excellent service for those in need of our help.  
  

  
Job Duties:
  

  
 
  

  

  
+ Locate and notify customers of delinquent accounts by mail & telephone to solicit payment
  

  
+ Duties include receiving payment and posting amount to customer's account
  

  
+ Preparing statements
  

  
+ Initiating lawsuit proceedings
  

  
+ Keeping records of collection and status of accounts
  

  
+ There is a monthly quota & monthly commission
  

  

  
Minimum Qualifications:
  

  

  
+ Must be at least  18 years old
  

  
+ Must have a high school diploma or equivalent
  

  
+ Be authorized to work in the United States
  

  

  
Address: 10024 Homestead Rd.  Houston, TX  77016
  

  
Starting Pay: $13 per hour (plus monthly commission averaging $500-$1,000)
  

  
Part time Schedule:  Tues thru Fri 5pm-9pm & Saturday 10:30am-2:30pm
  

  
OFF DAYS:  Sun & Mon
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Clerk]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Company Overview
  

  
A Better Bail Bond is the premiere company in Houston, Texas.  Our 30+ years of experience qualifies us as experts in the bailbond industry, nationwide.  Though we may seem like a small company with multiple offices, we are actually a large family living & working in different offices; but connected by our desire to provide an excellent service for those in need of our help. 
  

  
Job Summary
  

  
 The Clerk is required to exhibit  STRONG clerical skills by preparing various types of bail bonds & heavy data entry; along with additional assigned duties.  Organizational skills and great attention to detail is needed. 
  

  
 OFFICE LOCATION: 10024 Homestead Rd. Houston, TX 77016
  

  
SCHEDULE IS: 8a-5p Mon-Fri (OFF SAT & SUN)
  

  
 
  

  
Responsibilities and Duties
  

  

  
+ Appointment Setting
  

  
+ Heavy data entry
  

  
+ Heavy incoming and outgoing phone calls
  

  
+ Reports to Office Manager
  

  
+ Responsible for maintaining flow of client data for back end productivity
  

  

  
Qualifications and Skills
  

  

  
+ Must type 40 wpm
  

  
+ Must be at least  18 years old
  

  
+ Must have a high school diploma or equivalent
  

  
+ Be authorized to work in the United States
  

  

  
Additional Info
  

  

  
+ Paid time off after first 90 days
  

  
+ Free Parking
  

  
+ Long Term Disability Insurance
  

  

  
Powered by JazzHR
